content: playful nostalgia gets a refresh on this crochet bag that s bound to bring a smile to your face designed in caron simply me this whimsical pattern is reminiscent of the carefree joy of carnival days practice single_crochet half_double_crochet chain stitch pom pom slip_stitch surface slip_stitch and more customize your trio of colors to give this quirky bag a personal touch it s a fun way to turn every outing into a cheerful event materials caron® simply me™ 7 oz/200 g 246 yds/225 m contrast a aran 8013 1 ball or 55 yds/ 50 m contrast b moonstone 8010 1 ball or 120 yds/ 110 m contrast c ruby 8003 1 ball or 246 yds/ 225 m measurements approx 7 18 cm wide x 8 20 5 cm tall excluding strap
